price: Nítorí náà, ní ti ẹni tí wọ́n bá fún ní tírà rẹ̀ ní ọwọ́ ọ̀tún rẹ̀, ó máa sọ pé: “Ẹ gbà, ẹ ka tírà mi wò.
arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُواْ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu biyamīnihi fayaqūlu hāumu iq'raū kitābiyah
